item.title: 100 Mbps Corporate Ethernet
item.description:
For medium to large businesses, a 100 Mbps connection speed is becoming the new norm. While this might seem excessive and expensive, it’s actually neither. In essence, Fast Ethernet is taking over the role of DS3. A decade ago, a 1.5 Mbps T1 line was considered high bandwidth. Today’s need for 100 Mbps reflects the significant evolution of application requirements. We’ve transitioned from basic video conferencing to high-definition, two-way video and telepresence...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/100-mbps-corporate-ethernet/
